plugin-data.name: Terse Tally
plugin-data.description: Tallies site visits for each day of the last week and displays on dashboard.

stat-style-tip: Allows display of today's visits from theme or pages.
stat-style-howto:
Include an element with an id of "%1$s" to display. For example:
<span id="%1$s">Hits Today: </span>
